description: 1-minute demo: AI-powered IT helpdesk with automated troubleshooting, knowledge retrieval, and ticket resolution
trigger_phrases: Help me fix my laptop issue - it's running really slow and I have a meeting in 30 minutes.

persona.name: Tom Richardson
persona.title: IT Service Desk Manager
persona.context: Managing IT support for 8,000 employees with 15 technicians, seeking to improve first-call resolution and reduce ticket volume

agents_utilized.description: Retrieves user profile, device inventory, and IT history
Analyzes symptoms and diagnoses likely causes
Searches IT knowledge base for solutions and workarounds
Executes automated fixes and provides guided troubleshooting
Routes complex issues to appropriate support tiers
Creates, updates, and manages support tickets
Generates session summaries and satisfaction tracking

conversation_flow.user_message: Help me fix my laptop issue - it's running really slow and I have a meeting in 30 minutes.
conversation_flow.agent_response:
Hi Michael! I see your urgency - let's get this fixed quickly. I've pulled up your device information.

**Your Device Profile:**

| Detail | Value |
|--------|-------|
| Device | Dell Latitude 5520 |
| OS | Windows 11 Pro |
| Age | 2.5 years |
| Last restart | 8 days ago |
| Disk space | 12% free (low) |

**Quick Diagnostics Running:**

| Check | Status | Finding |
|-------|--------|--------|
| Memory usage | Warning | 94% utilized |
| Disk space | Critical | Only 12% free |
| Running processes | Warning | 127 active |
| Last restart | Warning | 8 days ago |
| Updates pending | Info | 3 updates ready |

**Likely Causes (Ranked):**
1. **Low disk space** (12% free = performance impact)
2. **Too many apps open** (94% memory)
3. **Needs restart** (8 days uptime)
4. **Background processes** (127 running)

**Urgency Noted:** 30 minutes to meeting - focusing on quick fixes.

Source: [Asset Management + Remote Diagnostics]
Agents: UserContextAgent, IssueDiagnosisAgent

Start quick remediation?

Running quick fixes now. I'll handle what I can remotely.

**Immediate Actions (Automated):**

| Action | Status | Impact |
|--------|--------|--------|
| Clear temp files | Running... | Free 4.2 GB |
| End background processes | Running... | Free 18% memory |
| Clear browser cache | Running... | Free 1.8 GB |
| Disable startup apps | Ready | Faster next boot |

**Disk Space Recovery:**

| Item | Size | Safe to Clear |
|------|------|---------------|
| Temp files | 4.2 GB | Yes (clearing) |
| Browser cache | 1.8 GB | Yes (clearing) |
| Windows Update cleanup | 2.1 GB | Yes (can run) |
| Recycle bin | 890 MB | Yes (can empty) |
| **Total recoverable** | **9.0 GB** | |

**Progress:**
- Temp files: ✓ Cleared (4.2 GB freed)
- Cache: ✓ Cleared (1.8 GB freed)
- Background apps: ✓ 12 processes ended
- Memory freed: 22%

**Current Status:**
- Disk space: 12% → 24% free
- Memory: 94% → 72% utilized

**Still Recommended:** Restart after your meeting for full optimization.

Source: [Remote Management + Automation Scripts]
Agents: RemediationAgent, KnowledgeSearchAgent

Test if it's faster now?

conversation_flow.user_message: It's a little better but still sluggish. What else can we do quickly?
conversation_flow.agent_response:
Let's try a few more quick optimizations before your meeting.

**Additional Quick Fixes:**

| Action | Time | Expected Impact |
|--------|------|----------------|
| Close unused browser tabs | 30 sec | Significant |
| Restart Teams | 30 sec | Often helps |
| Disable visual effects | 1 min | Moderate |
| Check for runaway process | 30 sec | Could be big |

**Process Check:**

| Process | CPU | Memory | Status |
|---------|-----|--------|--------|
| Chrome (14 tabs) | 18% | 2.4 GB | High usage |
| Teams | 12% | 1.1 GB | Normal |
| Outlook | 8% | 680 MB | Normal |
| OneDrive sync | 15% | 420 MB | Syncing |

**Recommendation: Close Chrome tabs**
- You have 14 tabs open
- Chrome using 2.4 GB memory
- Keep only tabs needed for meeting

**Quick Actions I Can Do:**
1. Pause OneDrive sync (frees CPU + network)
2. Close other browser windows
3. Enable performance mode

**After Meeting:**
- Full restart (fixes most issues)
- Run Windows Update
- Consider SSD upgrade (device is 2.5 years old)

Source: [Remote Diagnostics + KB Article #IT-2341]
Agents: RemediationAgent, KnowledgeSearchAgent

Pause OneDrive and enable performance mode?

conversation_flow.user_message: Yes, do that. And can you schedule someone to look at it after my meeting?
conversation_flow.agent_response:
Done! Performance mode enabled and technician scheduled.

**Actions Completed:**

| Action | Status | Effect |
|--------|--------|--------|
| OneDrive paused | ✓ Complete | 15% CPU freed |
| Performance mode | ✓ Enabled | Visual effects reduced |
| Browser tabs | Reminder sent | Close extras |

**Current Performance:**

| Before | After All Fixes |
|--------|----------------|
| Disk: 12% free | Disk: 24% free |
| Memory: 94% | Memory: 65% |
| CPU: High | CPU: Moderate |
| Responsiveness: Slow | Responsiveness: Improved |

**Technician Visit Scheduled:**

| Detail | Value |
|--------|-------|
| Technician | Sarah Martinez |
| Time | Today, 3:00 PM |
| Location | Your desk (Building A, Floor 3) |
| Ticket # | INC-2024-45892 |
| Purpose | Full diagnostic + optimization |

**Technician Will Check:**
- Hardware diagnostics
- SSD health assessment
- Potential upgrade recommendation
- Full system optimization
- Windows updates installation

**Your Meeting:** You should be good to go now!

Source: [ITSM + Technician Scheduling]
Agents: EscalationRoutingAgent, TicketManagementAgent

Anything else before your meeting?

conversation_flow.user_message: No, I think I'm good. Can you send me a summary?
conversation_flow.agent_response:
Summary sent to your email. Here's a copy for reference.

**Support Session Summary:**

**Issue:** Laptop running slowly before important meeting

**Actions Taken (Remote):**

| Fix | Result |
|-----|--------|
| Cleared temp files | 4.2 GB freed |
| Cleared browser cache | 1.8 GB freed |
| Ended background processes | 12 closed |
| Paused OneDrive sync | 15% CPU freed |
| Enabled performance mode | Visual effects reduced |

**Improvement Achieved:**

| Metric | Before | After |
|--------|--------|-------|
| Disk space | 12% | 24% |
| Memory usage | 94% | 65% |
| Responsiveness | Slow | Improved |

**Follow-Up Scheduled:**

| Appointment | Details |
|-------------|--------|
| Date/time | Today, 3:00 PM |
| Technician | Sarah Martinez |
| Location | Your desk |
| Ticket | INC-2024-45892 |

**Reminders:**
- Restart laptop after your meeting
- Close Chrome tabs you don't need
- OneDrive will auto-resume in 4 hours

**Email Sent:** michael.chen@company.com

Source: [Session Log + ITSM]
Agents: TicketManagementAgent, ITSupportSummaryAgent

Good luck with your meeting!

You're welcome, Michael! Here's your complete session recap.

**Session Complete:**

| Metric | Value |
|--------|-------|
| Issue reported | Slow laptop |
| Time to first fix | 2 minutes |
| Total session time | 6 minutes |
| Resolution | Temporary fix + scheduled full service |
| Urgency met | Yes (ready for meeting) |

**What We Accomplished:**

| Outcome | Status |
|---------|--------|
| Quick performance boost | Achieved |
| Disk space freed | 6 GB |
| Memory freed | 29% |
| Technician scheduled | Today 3 PM |
| Documentation | Complete |

**Your Ticket:** INC-2024-45892

**Rating Request:**
After your meeting, you'll receive a quick 2-question survey.

**Self-Service Tips for Future:**
- Restart weekly (prevents buildup)
- Keep 20%+ disk space free
- Close unused apps and tabs
- Check for updates regularly

**IT Helpdesk Stats Today:**
- Your issue: Resolved in 6 min
- Average resolution: 12 min
- Self-service success: 73%

Source: [All IT Systems]
Agents: ITSupportSummaryAgent (orchestrating all agents)

Your AI IT support resolved your urgent issue in 6 minutes with remote fixes, freeing 6 GB of disk space and 29% memory - and scheduled a technician for a full tune-up after your meeting.

design_principles.visual_elements: 1 status indicator OR 1 table per response

business_value.problem: 8,000 employees with IT issues, limited technician capacity, long wait times, repetitive Tier 1 issues
business_value.solution: AI-powered IT helpdesk with automated diagnostics, remote remediation, and intelligent escalation
business_value.roi: 6-minute resolution (vs 12 min average), 73% self-service success, reduced technician escalations
business_value.performance: Instant device diagnostics, automated remote fixes, seamless technician scheduling, complete documentation
